headline: Travel To Make Memories All Around The World
subtitle: Discover the most beautiful places, experiences and amazing attractions around the world.

infoContact: Tasnim Travel is not only a great site for finding tours, but also a professional team of managers who will always come to help for you and will be with you in sorrow and in joy throughout your holiday.
name: Name
aboutCompany: We organize group and individual tours based on our own charter programs and regular flights, develop intensive, sports and other types of tourism, and also actively sell air tickets online.
aboutUs: Tasnim Travel has been on the market since 2022. Today we occupy a leading position in the tourism industry and are positioned as a brand of reliability and quality. The team of Ziyarat Tour serves clients in Uzbekistan, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt, Europe and other countries.
aboutTours: If your priority is high-quality service in your vacation and always choose the best, then we are on the same track with you!
